meanings.definition: A decorative element consisting of four leaves or petals.
meanings.sent1: The artist added quatrefoils to the border of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The quatrefoils on the stained glass window added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The quatrefoils on the cake looked like tiny green flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace sparkled with quatrefoils, resembling a garden in bloom.
meanings.sent5: The quatrefoils in the garden were so intricate, they seemed to dance in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A design or pattern resembling a four-leaf clover.
meanings.sent1: The rug had quatrefoils woven into its intricate design.
meanings.sent2: She found a quatrefoils pattern on the fabric that she loved.
meanings.sent3: The quatrefoils on the wallpaper made the room feel like a lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: The quatrefoils on the quilt were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The quatrefoils on the dress gave it a whimsical and charming look.

meanings.definition: A type of architectural ornament featuring four overlapping circles or lobes.
meanings.sent1: The cathedral's ceiling was adorned with quatrefoils, creating a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent2: The quatrefoils on the archway added a touch of sophistication to the building.
meanings.sent3: The quatrefoils on the door seemed to wink playfully at the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The quatrefoils on the fountain cast intricate shadows in the courtyard.
meanings.sent5: The quatrefoils on the balcony railing gave the building a unique and regal appearance.
